spaceSurvivor
Interface Hittable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AmmoPowerUp, AvoiderEnemy, BlobEnemy, BuilderEnemy, Bullet, ConfusedEnemy, DefaultEnemy, EnemyShip, PlayerShip, PowerUp, SeekerEnemy, ShieldPowerUp, SplitEnemy
public interface Hittable

Hittable must be implemented by sprites that can be hit. Source code of this interface based off of Hittable interface by Dr. Slattery: http://www.mscs.mu.edu/~mikes/cosc3550/demos/ForestFire-FullScreen/ForestFire.java

Author:
Paul

          Sets the object to die.

          Checks whether this object is alive.
 

Method Detail

isAlive

boolean isAlive()
Checks whether this object is alive.

Returns:
true if alive, false otherwise

die

void die()
Sets the object to die.

getBoundingBall

java.awt.geom.Ellipse2D.Double getBoundingBall()
Gets the bounding ball of the object. Note this is a bounding ball instead of bounding rectangle because the objects implementing this interface are mostly circular in shape.

Returns:
